s0542: Fifth year, Wei king came to court at Yingting, returned Puban to Wei.
s0543: Sixth year, Shu lord Hui rebelled, Sima Cuo pacified Shu.
s0544: Senior Minister Huan attacked Chu, beheaded 20,000.
s0545: Jingyang Jun went as hostage to Qi.
s0549: Eighth year, sent General Mi Yong to attack Chu, took Xinshi.
s0550: Qi sent Zhang Zi, Wei sent Gongsun Xi, Han sent Bao Yuan together attacked Chu Fangcheng, took Tangmei.
s0551: Zhao destroyed Zhongshan, its ruler fled, finally died in Qi.
s0552: Wei prince Jing, Han prince Chang became lords.
s0553: Ninth year, attacked Wei, took Shen.
s0554: Tenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang.
s0555: Eleventh year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0556: Twelfth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0557: Thirteenth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0558: Fourteenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0559: Fifteenth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0560: Sixteenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0561: Seventeenth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0562: Eighteenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0563: Nineteenth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0564: Twentieth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0565: Twenty-first year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0566: Twenty-second year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0567: Twenty-third year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0568: Twenty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0569: Twenty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0570: Twenty-sixth year, Qin Shi Huang ascended, his son Qin Er Shi ascended.
s0571: Qin Er Shi first year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.
s0572: Second year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.
s0573: Third year, Qin Er Shi died.
s0574: Too史公曰：秦之先為嬴姓。其後分封，以國為姓，有徐氏、郯氏、莒氏、終黎氏、運奄氏、菟裘氏、將梁氏、黄氏、江氏、脩魚氏、白冥氏、蜚廉氏、秦氏。然秦以其先造父封趙城，為趙氏。
s0575: Chancellor Li Si killed Fusu, established Huhai as Qin Er Shi.
s0576: The six states rose together, Qin destroyed them all.
s0577: Qin Shi Huang unified the world, made himself emperor.
s0578: He toured the eastern states, erected stone inscriptions.
s0579: He burned books and buried scholars.
s0580: He built the Great Wall, dug the Ling Canal.
s0581: He sought immortals, sent Xu Fu to sea.
s0582: He died at Shaqiu, Huhai became emperor.
s0583: The ministers Zhao Gao and Li Si plotted rebellion.
s0584: Chen Sheng and Wu Guang rose in rebellion.
s0585: Zhang Han attacked the rebels, but the Qin dynasty fell.
s0586: Liu Bang entered Guanzhong, became king of Han.
s0587: Xiang Yu destroyed Qin, divided the lands.
s0588: Han Xin attacked Wei, took Linjin.
s0589: Han Xin attacked Zhao, took Anyi.
s0590: Han Xin attacked Qi, took Linzi.
s0591: Liu Bang attacked Chu, took Pengcheng.
s0592: Xiang Yu counterattacked, defeated Han at Pengcheng.
s0593: Han Xin defeated Qi, Liu Bang defeated Chu.
s0594: Battle of Gaixia, Xiang Yu committed suicide.
s0595: Liu Bang became emperor, established the Han dynasty.
s0596: Han Gao Zu first year, attacked Qin remnants.
s0597: Second year, pacified the various lords.
s0605: Han Gao Zu died, Empress Lü acted as regent.
s0606: Wen Di ascended, practiced benevolent government.
s0607: Jing Di ascended, continued the policies.
s0608: Wu Di ascended, expanded the empire.
s0609: Wu Di died, Zhao Di ascended.
s0610: Zhao Di died, Xuan Di ascended.
s0611: Xuan Di died, Yuan Di ascended.
s0612: Yuan Di died, Cheng Di ascended.
s0613: Cheng Di died, Ai Di ascended.
s0614: Ai Di died, Ping Di ascended.
s0615: Ping Di died, Ruzi Ying ascended.
s0617: Liu Xiu restored the Han dynasty.
s0618: Guang Wu Di ascended, pacified the world.
s0619: Ming Di ascended, continued the legacy.
